name: Ajay Kumar Sahu
title: Full Stack Developer
objective: To make high-quality, exciting, and fun web and mobile applications that are challenging, provide opportunities to learn new technologies, and allow me to work with other highly motivated and talented developers.
aboutme: I am passionate about writing and testing my code, learning new things, and teaching others. I enjoy understanding problems, finding their solutions, making them simplified. I enjoy writing and contributing to open source software.  I also enjoy speaking at conferences and local user groups about JavaScript.

projects.name: Directorate of health Services, Sanjeevani Kosh, Raipur , Chhattisgarh
projects.technologies: C#.Net and ASP.Net backend SQL Server 2008
projects.description: Monitoring the status of the applications which reaching from all districts of Chhattisgarh,Monitoring the cases over network hospitals of Chhattisgarh and also to others,Focusing on  the death cases, unveiling the reasons of death and making case reports,Pointing out interventions of hospital administrations and making report on the same,SMS alert to the applicant as well as to the higher authorities for monitoring sincerely,Digitalizing the process and fastening the process where various departments involve,Using dot net technology, Development of the MIS system, SQL database, Developing a huge database where the data of whole state resides, Database must be robust and secure
